value.name: Selecting for strengths
value.description: PA Consulting’s strengths and talent expert, Sally Bibb, and policing expert, Richard Davis, examine how ‘trust based’ professions have strengthened their legitimacy and the lessons that policing can apply to recruitment.

value.name: Bus operators urge mayor to deploy police onto buses for protection
value.description: "We're asking for police presence on the bus, and it hasn't happened yet,” says Richard Davis. “There's no one inside to take a step to help us out with the mentally ill and also violent ...

value.name: Farmington approves ordinance amendments
value.description: At a Special Town Meeting attended only by town officials Tuesday night, May 25, four amendments to Farmington ordinances were approved.
